    Team

    As a publishing collective, Reanimate is comprised of a multidisciplinary, cross-institutional, international group of directors, partners, and editorial assistants:

    Directors

    • Roopika Risam, Salem State University
    • Carol Stabile, University of Oregon

    Partners

    • Sarah Kember and Adrian Driscoll, Goldsmiths Press
    • Trevor Muñoz, MITH, University of Maryland, College Park
    • Carolina Villarroel and Gabriela Baeza Ventura, Recovering the U.S. Hispanic Literary Heritage, University of Houston and Arté Publico Press
    • Franny Gaede, University of Oregon Libraries
    • Manifold Scholarship, University of Minnesota Press
    • Fembot Collective

    Editorial Assistants

    • Laura Strait
    • Emil Gil

    We gratefully acknowledge financial contributions from University of Oregon and Salem State University and in kind contributions from Manifold Scholarship at the University of Minnesota Press.
